attributes.action: Medal for Tony Foulds, has spent a lifetime tending a memorial in Sheffield.
attributes.additional_details: In making their sacrifice they saved the lives of people living and playing in the area. Tony has made it his mission to maintain their memorial in the years since February 22nd 1944
attributes.background: Tony Foulds has spent a lifetime keeping the memory of 10 US airman alive afler they gave their lives to make sure that their bomber which was severly damaged did not crash land on a park in Sheffield.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that call for someone to be given an honour.
